detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract REDSToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REDSToken.sol#73-186) has payable functions:
	 - REDSToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REDSToken.sol#183-185)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
